summary: you can make statues out of yourself,your statue may be posing whatever animation you like or use,wearing any armor you have wether its moded or not,any weapon,and the statue may be placed anywhere in the world that you'd like.heck you can even place it on a mountain!
descriptionHtml:
honestly im not sure where this mod should be listed,technicaly its a mod but litteraly its just a guideline to using whats avalible in the game in order to be able to place statues of yourself at will,anywhere in the world,using any animation you want(even adult animations),using any armor/weapons etc... that you'd like.

P.S : im not a ''like me'' kinda guy so it would be appreciated if you endorsed,but feel free not to.

[Requirements] :
1-fully functioning brain
2-http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24667/? Cosmetic auras mod.

im not even sure it requires that mod,its my lack of knowledge about how to add an effect to an npc that leads me to use that mod,altough the mod is brilliant,it might be tottaly unnecesary in the future.

------------------------
[instructions] :
all necessary instructions have been given in the images,check them,their step by step and VERY easy to use.

------------------------
Credits ?
not sure who i should give credit to.so i guess...bethesda and Rebalious the creator of cosmetic auras.
author: kutsujutsu
